mdRecord.dcterms:title: War Time Correspondence to Capt. C. M. Stigleman at Manassas Junction
mdRecord.dcterms:description: War time correspondence, October 17, 1861, to Capt. C. M. Stigleman, at Manassas Junction, Va, from A. J. Hoback at Floyd Co., Va. Subject: Private William Dehart will rejoin company after a long absence of being unfit for duty. 2 original pieces â€“ letter and envelope.
